entry.title: Adobe After Effects
entry.content: Adobe After Effects is a digital motion graphics, visual effects and compositing software package published by Adobe Systems, used in the post-production process of filmmaking and television production.

entry.title: Adobe Illustrator
entry.content: Adobe Illustrator is a vector graphics editor developed and marketed by Adobe Systems.

entry.title: iMovie
entry.content: iMovie is a proprietary video editing software application sold by Apple Inc. for the Mac and iOS

entry.title: VMWare Fusion
entry.content: VMware Fusion is a software hypervisor developed by VMware for Macintosh computers with Intel processors.
